column2: "Total RNA was extracted using the RNAeasy Mini Kit (Qiagen, Valencia, CA), amplified, labeled  and hybridized to GeneChip 1.0 arrays (Affymetrix, Santa Clara, CA)."
"~5.5ug of labeled cDNA was hybridized to Affymetrix Gene Array ST-1.0"
"100ng total RNA for each sample was linear amplified and labeled with Biotin"
